data.actual_result: The title and subject of the text channel is copied instead of your discriminator.
data.expected_result: Only your discrim is selected and copied.
data.short_description: Highlight the discriminator just a little bit copies the name and subject of the title.
data.steps_to_repro: - Highlight your discriminator below your username, but move your mouse about to your status icon. - CTRL+C
